events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position, including their updated resume and cover letter.
The candidate's application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering domain based on their experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process and coordinate upcoming interviews.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, and the candidate demonstrated good understanding of software development principles.
Candidate responded promptly with their availability for the technical interview and expressed enthusiasm for the role.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 10:00 AM UTC, focusing on coding challenges and system design.
The candidate completed the technical interview and showed strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in relevant programming languages.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 3:00 PM UTC to discuss cultural fit and company values.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with the candidate expressing alignment with the company culture and expectations.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate, outlining salary, benefits, and start date options.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested minor clarifications regarding benefits.
The candidate has accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date as June 1st, excited to join the engineering team.
Onboarding process has begun with the candidate reviewing all required documents and completing initial training modules.
The hiring process is now complete with the candidate successfully joining the team as a Software Engineer.
